account.PleaseEnterYourPasswordForAccount: Please enter your password for account
account.YouJustCreatedAccount: You have just created a new fresh account.
account.accessLevelChangeAlert: Changing from Read Only to Full Access mode will require you to enter the secret key for your account
account.accountActivateReserveExplain: The first %{baseReserve} XRP deposited into your account cannot be spent, but will be reserved to keep your account active and pay for on ledger fees.
account.accountDestroyWarning: Your account will be deleted permanently, are you sure?
account.accountGenerateActivationExplain: Account activation is a requirement on the XRP ledger. To activate, you will have to make a first deposit of at least %{baseReserve} XRP.
account.accountImportActivationExplain: You imported a new account on the XRP ledger. The account is not activated. Account activation is a requirement on the XRP ledger. To activate, you will have to make a first deposit of at least %{baseReserve} XRP.
account.accountMaxLabelLengthError: Account label should be less than 16 characters!
account.accountRemoveWarning: Your account will be deleted permanently from XUMM. Are you sure?
account.accountReserveNotShownExplain: Your reserved XRP will not show up as balance in XUMM, but you can view your reserve with the "Explain my balance" button in the home screen, above your XRP balance.
account.accountSettingsDescription: You can edit your account settings or account label here.
account.addAccountDescription: Import your existing account, or create a new account.
account.allDoneYouCanGoToNextStepNow: You're all set! You can now go to the next step.
account.chooseWisely: Please choose the security level that suits this account
account.confirmPrivateDescription: Please provide the numbers, this is for your own safety: we want you to confirm you wrote it down.
account.currentPasswordShouldNotBeEmpty: Current Password should not be empty!
account.deleteAccountObjectsExistError: You cannot delete this account, because it contains specific XRP ledger objects, like tokens (non-XRP), Decentralized Exchange (DEX) offers, Escrows (as a creator or beneficiary)
account.deleteAccountSequenceIsNotEnoughError: This account cannot be deleted yet. It takes %{remainingSequence} more ledgers to close before this account can be deleted.
account.deleteAccountWarning: This is an Account Delete transaction. When signing your account will be deleted, and all your remaining funds (except for the last %{ownerReserve} reserved XRP, as the fee on the  XRP ledger for deleting an account is %{ownerReserve} XRP) will be sent to the configured destination. Please check the destination twice, and ONLY continue if you ACTUALLY want to delete your account on the XRP ledger
account.destinationAccountAndSourceCannotBeSame: Destination account and source cannot be the same.
account.destinationAccountIsNotActivated: Destination account is not activated, Must be a funded account in the XRP ledger.
account.destinationAddressRequiredDestinationTag: Destination Address requires a Destination Tag
account.disableMasterKeyWarning: The transaction DISABLES the private key for the account. This may lock you out. Only continue if you are absolutely sure this is what you want, and you know what you are doing.
account.downgradingAccessLevelWarning: You are downgrading your account access level. Doing so changes your account into a Read Only account, as XUMM will purge the internal, encrypted record of your secret key. You can only access your funds again when you import your secret key again. Only continue if you are certain you have an offline backup of your secret key for this account.
account.downgradingAccessLevelWarningPhysical: You are downgrading your access level. Are you sure?
account.enteredCurrentPasswordIsInvalid: The current entered password is invalid!
account.getStartedCreateAccount: Get started by adding your first account.
account.goBackClearTheInput:
Are you sure you want to go back? 
 (Any entered inputs will be cleared for security reasons)
account.goBackRefillTheInput:
Are you sure you want to go back? 
 (you have to re-fill all the inputs for security reasons)
account.hereIsYourPublicKey: Here's your new account. You can now receive funds to the generated public account address.
account.howManyWordsYourMnemonicIs: How many words does your mnemonic have?
account.importExchangeAddressReadonlyWarning:
It is not possible to import your Exchange (deposit) account. Doing so does not allow you to track your own balance on the exchange.

Importing a read only account only works if this is your own, activated account, like the account of your hardware wallet.
account.importSecretWithoutChecksumWarning:
If you proceed, you will import an XRP Ledger account from Secret Numbers. You are the sole party responsible to generate the Secret Numbers. We recommend you to use an offline method (eg. with dice) to generate them. After you generated the numbers, you must store them (eg. stamped in metal, written down).
YOU SHOULD PROCEED ONLY IF YOU KNOW WHAT YOU ARE DOING.
account.invalidHexPrivateKey: Invalid HEX private key! HEX private keys should be 66 HEX characters (A-F, 0-9) long.
account.masterKeyForThisAccountDisableRegularKey: Master key for this account is disabled and regular key account not found in accounts list!
account.mnemonicLargeAmountAlert: If you consider importing your mnemonic account while your account holds significant value (eg. your savings, larger amounts of XRP or other tokens), please consider creating a new account in XUMM to keep your mnemonic account offline instead.
account.neverSharePrivateKey: Never share your secret numbers (private key) with someone else. If you do, you may lose access to your funds.
account.passcodeOptionDesc: This is ideal for daily spending. You can sign transactions by simply showing your face, scanning your finger or entering your passcode.
account.passwordConfirmNotMatch: Your entered passwords do not match
account.passwordOptionDesc: This option is better for long term storage of XRP and tokens and requires a password to sign transactions
account.passwordShouldContain: Your password strength should be at least Fair, please use a long or more difficult password (longer is better).
account.pleaseChooseAccountLabel: Please enter a name for this account (e.g. 'Spending' or 'Savings').
account.pleaseEnterAllWords: Please enter all your mnemonic words!
account.pleaseEnterSafePassword: Create an extended length password that is easy to remember, but impossible for others to guess.
account.pleaseProvideAccountAddress:
Please provide your account address 
(Starts with 'r...')
account.pleaseProvideFamilySeed: Please provide your account secret/family Seed.
account.pleaseProvideMnemonic: Please provide your Mnemonic (24 words) for your account.
account.pleaseSelectAccountSecretType: Please select your account secret type
account.pleaseWriteDownAllNumbers: Please write down all the numbers
account.privateKeyRowsDesc: Only you can touch your funds, but you will have to keep your secret numbers safe. Your secret consists of 8 rows (labelled A-H) containing 6 digits per row.
account.publicKeyCopiedToClipboard: Account address copied to the clipboard
account.regularKeyAccountForThisAccountDoesNotIm: Regular Key for this account was not imported with sign access!
account.removeTrustLineWarning: You are removing this token from your XRP Ledger account. Are you sure?
account.scannedCardIsNotATangemXRPCard: The scanned Tangem Card is not an XRP card!
account.secretNumbersDesc: Preferred account type. 8 rows of 6 digits
account.selectedAccountIsNotActivatedPleaseChoos: Selected account is not activated. To sign this transaction you need to select an activated account!
account.signatureVerificationExplain: To verify your Tangem cards is working correctly and able to sign transactions, we will perform one signing routine to verify transaction signatures generated by your card.
account.tangemCardEmptyGenerateWalletAlert: Your Tangem card does not contain an XRP Ledger account yet. To use this card, an account will have to be generated by the card.
account.tangemCardPasscodeSetWarning:
While adding a passcode to your card improves the safety of your funds in case of a lost (and found) card, it is important to realize that your funds will be INACCESSIBLE and CAN *NOT* BE RECOVERED (by anyone) if you don't remember your passcode.

Are you really sure you want to add a passcode to your card?
account.tangemLongTapExplain: This mechanism protects the card against proximity attacks: it will enforce a delay between reception and execution of commands.
account.tangemNFCNotSupportedDeviceAlert: Using Tangem cards requires NFC capabilities. Your phone does not seem to support NFC.
account.tangemPasscodeExplain: Before the execution of any command entailing a change of the state of the card, you will have to enter the passcode.
account.tapAndHoldToReorder: Tap and hold on an item to reorder by the desired priority
account.thereAreTwoAccountsEligibleToSign: There are two accounts eligible to sign. Which one do you want to sign with?
account.thisAddressAppearsToBeExchangeAddress:
This address appears to be an exchange address, are you sure you want to continue?

You can never send to this address without respecting the instructions of your exchange.
account.toTurnYourSecretIntoXrplLedgerAccountPle: If you want to open an XRP Ledger account, please enter your secret keys.
account.unableGetDestinationAccountInfo: Unable to get destination account info, please make sure you are connected to the XRP ledger node
account.unableToCheckAccountNFTs: Unable to check for account NFTs, please make sure you are connected to the XRP ledger node
account.unableToCheckAccountObjects: Unable to check for account objects, please make sure you are connected to the XRP ledger node
account.unableToFetchLedgerSequence: Unable to fetch the current ledger sequence. Please make sure you are connected to the XRP Ledger node.
account.unableToHideAllAccountsError: Unable to hide this account. At least one account should be visible.
account.unavailableChangeSecurityLevel: Changing Security level is not available right now
account.upgradeAccountSecretIsNotMatch: The entered secret belongs to another r-address. If you want to import a regular key, please [Import new account]. If not, please [cancel] and check your entry.
account.upgradingAccessLevelWarning: You are upgrading your access level. You need to import your private key for this account.
account.writeDownPrivateKey: Write down all the rows on a piece of paper and keep it somewhere safe! If your device crashes and you don't have the secret numbers anymore, your funds are LOST.
account.youCanAlwaysGetFullAccess: You can upgrade a read only account to a full access account later on
account.yourXRPLedgerAccountIsGoingToBe: Your XRP Ledger account is going to be:
account.yourXRPLedgerAccountWillNotBeTouched: Your XRP Ledger account & funds will not be touched.
account.tangemAccessCodeExplain: Before the execution of any command, you will have to enter the access code.
account.accountLabelCannotBeMoreThan: Account label cannot be more than 64 characters!
account.importingSecretAccountExist:
The account secret that you have entered belongs to this r-address and has already been imported into Xumm as a full access account.

%{address}
account.unableGetAccountInfo: Unable to fetch account info, please make sure you are connected to the XRP ledger node
account.unableToHideDefaultAccountError: Unable to hide this default account. Change default account and try again.
account.tangemCardAccessCodeSetWarning:
While adding a access code to your card improves the safety of your funds in case of a lost (and found) card, it is important to realize that your funds will be INACCESSIBLE and CAN *NOT* BE RECOVERED (by anyone) if you don't remember your access code.

Are you really sure you want to add a access code to your card?
account.checkWhichAccountsNeedBetterEncryption: Check which accounts need better encryption
account.whyUseThisNewEncryptionMethod: Why use this new encryption method?
account.newEncryptionExplain: Our encryption & security is enhanced to new standards AES512 GCM. You should encrypt your account with this new method to be extra safe. Although you are already safe, it can't hurt to upgrade to the new standards.
account.doNotTurnOffYourPhoneOrQuiteWhileMigrati: Don't turn off your phone or quit the app while doing the encryption.
account.unableToFetchAccountNFTokens: Unable to fetch the account NFT's. Please make sure you are connected to the XRP Ledger node.

asset.addingAssetReserveDescription: Adding a token to your XRP Ledger account will increase your XRP Ledger enforced account reserve by %{ownerReserve} XRP
asset.addingTrustLineWarning:
XRPL Labs / XUMM does not endorse any token or token issuer. You should only proceed if you trust the token issuer.
In case of questions or problems regarding the token (TrustLine) you will need to contact the token issuer.

Continue at your own risk.
asset.dustAmountRemovedYouCanRemoveTrustLineNo: Your dust balance has been sent back to the issuer. The TrustLine can now be eliminated.
asset.failedRemove: Error: the token could not be removed!
asset.lineLimitMisconfigurationWarning: This TrustLine has a limit of zero (0) configured, meaning others cannot send this token to you: you can only hold the token. To be able to receive this token as well, XUMM can update your TrustLine to remove the zero (0) TrustLine limit.
asset.ripplingMisconfigurationWarning: Rippling not turned off for this Trust Line, if you don't know what this is and/or this is not on purpose, please update this setting to prevent potential loss of %{token} tokens
asset.selectAnExchangeAndSelectAsset: Select an issuer and select the token you would like to add. This list is maintained by the XUMM team.
asset.successRemoved: Token has been removed successfully from your account
asset.trustLineDustRemoveWarning: This TrustLine still contains a really small amount of %{balance} %{currency}. If you continue, it will be sent back to the issuer before your TrustLine is deleted.
asset.trustLineIsAlreadyExist: This token already exists. You cannot add the same token again.
asset.unableToRemoveAssetNotInDefaultState: This token cannot be removed from your account. The issuer either added specific settings for this token or their account is not properly configured.
asset.issuerAddressCopiedToClipboard: Issuer address copied to the clipboard

events.accountWillCreateAPaymentChannelTo: The account %{account} will create a payment channel to %{destination}
events.emptyEventsNoAccount: There are no events because you do not have an account.
events.escrowFinishTransactionExplain:
Completion was triggered by %{address}
The escrowed amount of %{amount} XRP was delivered to %{destination}
events.itAuthorizesSendingPaymentsToThisAccount: It authorizes %{address} to send payments to this account
events.itCreatesTicketForThisAccount: It creates %{ticketCount} ticket(s) for this account.
events.itEstablishesTrustLineTo: It establishes %{limit} as the maximum amount of %{currency} from %{issuer} that %{address} is willing to hold.
events.itRemovesAuthorizesSendingPaymentsToThis: It removes the authorization for %{address} to send payments to this account
events.itRemovesTheAccountEmailHash: It removes the account's email hash
events.itRemovesTheAccountMessageKey: It removes the account message key
events.itRemovesTheAccountRegularKey: It removes the account regular key
events.itRemovesTheAccountTransferRate: It removes the account transfer rate
events.itSetsAccountDomainTo: It sets the account domain to %{domain}
events.itSetsAccountEmailHashTo: It sets the account's email hash to %{emailHash}
events.itSetsAccountMessageKeyTo: It sets the account message key to %{messageKey}
events.itSetsAccountRegularKeyTo: It sets the account regular key to %{regularKey}
events.itSetsAccountTransferRateTo: It sets the account transfer rate to %{transferRate}
events.itWasInstructedToDeliverByCashingCheck: It was instructed to deliver %{amount} %{currency} to %{address} by cashing check with ID %{checkId}
events.itWasInstructedToDeliverTheRemainingBala: It was instructed to deliver the remaining balance of %{amount} %{currency} to %{destination}
events.itWillIncreaseTheChannelAmount: It will increase the channel amount by %{amount} XRP
events.itWillUpdateThePaymentChannel: It will update the payment channel %{channel}
events.maximumAmountCheckIsAllowToDebit: Maximum amount of source currency the Check is allowed to debit the sender is %{value} %{currency}
events.nftAcceptOfferBuyExplanation: %{address} accepted NFT token offer with ID %{offerID} for %{amount} %{currency} in order to receive NFT token with ID %{tokenID}
events.nftAcceptOfferSellExplanation: %{address} accepted NFT token offer with ID %{offerID} for NFT token with ID %{tokenID} in order to receive %{amount} %{currency}
events.nftOfferBuyExplain: %{address} offered to pay %{amount} %{currency} in order to receive NFT token with ID %{tokenID}
events.nftOfferSellExplain: %{address} offered to sell NFT token with ID %{tokenID} in order to receive %{amount} %{currency}
events.nftokenBurnExplain: The transaction will burn NFT token with ID %{tokenID}
events.offerTransactionExplain: %{address} offered to pay %{takerGetsValue} %{takerGetsCurrency} in order to receive %{takerPaysValue} %{takerPaysCurrency}
events.pleaseReleaseThisEscrowUsingTheToolUsedT: Please release this escrow using the tool / platform used to create it. XUMM cannot release the escrow as there is an Escrow Condition present on it.
events.theChannelBalanceClaimedIs: The channel balance claimed is %{balance} XRP
events.theChannelHasASettlementDelay: The channel has a settlement delay of %{delay} seconds
events.theCheckHasADestinationTag: The check has a destination Tag: %{tag}
events.theCheckHasASourceTag: The Check has a Source Tag: %{tag}
events.theEscrowHasADestinationTag: The escrow has a destination tag: %{tag}
events.theExchangeRateForThisOfferIs: The exchange rate for this offer is %{rate} %{takerPaysCurrency}/%{takerGetsCurrency}
events.theOfferExpiresAtUnlessCanceledOrAccepte: The offer expires at %{expiration} unless it is canceled or accepted before then.
events.theOfferExpiresAtUnlessCanceledOrConsume: The offer expires at %{expiration} unless canceled or consumed before then.
events.thePaymentChannelWillBeClosed: The payment channel will be closed. Any remaining funds will be returned to the source account.
events.theTransactionIsAlsoCancelOffer: The transaction will also cancel %{address} 's existing offer #%{offerSequence}
events.theTransactionWillCancelCheckWithId: The transaction will cancel check with ID %{checkId}
events.theTransactionWillCancelNftOffer: The transaction will cancel %{address}'s offer for NFT offers with ID
events.thisNftOfferMayOnlyBeAcceptedBy: This offer may only be accepted by %{address}
events.thisTransactionDecreaseAccountReserve: This transaction decreased the account reserve by %{ownerReserve} XRP
events.thisTransactionIncreaseAccountReserve: This transaction increased the account reserve by %{ownerReserve} XRP
events.transactionFailedWithCode: This transaction failed with a status code of %{txCode}
events.unableToLoadTheTransaction: Unable to load the transaction, please make sure you are connected to internet!
events.escrowFinishExplain:
Completion was triggered by %{address}
The escrowed amount of %{amount} %{currency} was delivered to %{destination}
events.itSetsAccountMinterTo: It sets the account minter to %{minter}
events.accountCreatedAPaymentChannelTo: The account %{account} created a payment channel to %{destination}
events.nftAcceptOfferBrokerFee: Broker fee for this offer is %{brokerFee} %{currency}
events.thisTransactionDoesNotEffectAnyAccountSe: This transaction doesn't affect any account settings.
events.thisOfferCanOnlyBeAcceptedByThirdParty: This offer has a third party (e.g. a Broker) set as a destination. Only this account can accept the offer.

exchange.doYouWantToExchange: Are you sure you want to exchange %{payAmount} %{payCurrency} for %{getAmount} %{getCurrency}?
exchange.exchangeByThirdPartyMessage: If you want to create an offer for execution at a requested price level, you can use the 3rd party XUMM enabled XRP Toolkit application to create a limit order.
exchange.failedExchange: Cannot exchange right now due to lack of liquidity, or updated exchange rates.
exchange.liquidityIsNotEnough: There is not enough liquidity, cannot exchange right now!
exchange.liquidityIsNotSoMuch: There's relatively low liquidity. You can still continue, but you may not get the best rate for your entire exchange!
exchange.maxReverseSlippageExceeded: The exchange rate will be bad if you would try to exchange back, as there are not enough (good) offers on the Decentralized Exchange.
exchange.maxSlippageExceeded: The exchange rate will be bad as there are not enough (good) offers on the Decentralized Exchange.
exchange.maxSpreadExceeded: The price difference between selling and buying offers is too high.
exchange.requestedLiquidityNotAvailable: The amount can't be exchanged: there are not enough offers available on the Decentralized Exchange.
exchange.reverseLiquidityNotAvailable: The amount can't be exchanged: based on the lack of offers on the Decentralized Exchange, you would not be able to exchange it back.
exchange.slippageSpreadWarning:
The exchange rate displayed is an estimate based on the current offers available on the XRP Ledger Decentralized Exchange.
When you execute this trade and the liquidity changes while executing your transaction, you may get an up to %{slippage}% worse exchange rate. Please continue only if you accept this.
exchange.theMaxAmountYouCanExchangeIs: The maximum amount you can exchange is %{spendable} %{currency}

global.addingCustomNodeWarning: You are adding a custom node to XUMM, do you want to continue?
global.atLeastOneSymbol: At least one special character (! @ , ? etc.)
global.autoWipeAlert: You have incorrectly attempted to unlock the app %{times} times, after 1 more unsuccessful attempt, the app will be reset and all your account data will be lost.
global.biometricIsNotAvailable: Biometrics (Fingerprint or Face ID) is unavailable. If your device supports biometrics authentication, please configure it first (OS settings).
global.biometryIsNotSupported: Biometric authentication is not supported on this device!
global.cannotValidateCurrentTimeWithServer: Cannot synchronize application time with server time. Make sure you are connected to the internet!
global.customNodeSuccessfullyAddedToXUMM: Custom node successfully added to XUMM. Do you want to switch to the added node?
global.looksLikeYouAreOffline: Looks like you're offline (no internet connection)

global.noSpendableAccountIsAvailableForSendingP: There is currently no available balance for sending payments.
global.openXRPToolkitByTowoLabs: Open XRP Toolkit by Towo Labs
global.passcodeAttemptExceed: Passcode attempts limit exceeded, please try again later.

global.pleaseCheckSessionLogForMoreInfo: Please check the session logs for more info!
global.pushErrorPermissionMessage: Unable to register push notifications. To grant the required notification permission, please go to your system settings and make sure that XUMM > Notifications are enabled.
global.scannedAddressIsNotAValidXRPLAddress: Scanned address is not a valid XRPL address.
global.signedTransactionDetectedSubmit: Signed transaction detected, submit to the ledger?

The amount is too small to be displayed:

global.thePasscodeYouEnteredIsIncorrectExplain: The passcode you entered is incorrect. To sign a transaction, you need to enter the right passcode. You entered this passcode when you setup XUMM for the first time.
global.thePasswordYouEnteredIsIncorrectExplain: The password you entered is incorrect. To sign a transaction, you need to enter the right password. You entered this password when you added the account you want to sign with to XUMM.
global.thisAccountIsReportedAsScamOrFraudulentA: This account is reported as scam or fraudulent address. Please proceed with caution
global.thisMayTakeFewSeconds: This may take a few seconds...
global.tooManyAttempts: Too many failed attempts. Please try again in %{after} minutes.
global.transactionFeeIsNotSet: Transaction fee is not set, please wait until transaction fee is set and try again!
global.unableToConnectToXRPLNodePleaseCheckYour: Unable to connect to XRPL node, Please check your internet connection and try again

global.unableToLoadCustomEndpointDetails: Unable to load the endpoint details. Please try again!

%{url}
global.biometricChangeError: Biometric authentication is disabled due a change in biometric data or system settings on your device. Please re-enable biometric authentication by manually going to Settings -> Security -> Biometric Authentication

home.emptyAccountAddFirstAccount: It’s a little bit empty here add your first account.
home.exchangeAccountReadonlyExplain: You cannot deposit directly to your exchange account: you need a destination tag to do so. Please get your destination tag from your exchange, and deposit manually.
home.howActivateMyAccount: How can I activate my account?
home.howActivateMyAccountDesc: To prevent spam account creation, the XRP Ledger requires at least %{baseReserve} XRP to be deposited into an account to activate it. The %{baseReserve} XRP is not lost: it will remain in your account, but you cannot spend it. To start using your account, make sure a deposit greater than %{baseReserve} XRP is made to your account.
home.otherAssetsDesc: The XRP ledger also allows you to hold balances of, and to send and receive, tokens other than XRP. These tokens can be issued by other accounts on the XRP ledger. If you want to be able to send or receive a non-XRP token, you will have to trust the issuer of the non-XRP token.
home.shareReadonlyAccountWarning: Do you own the keys to this Read Only account or is this your exchange account?
home.xrpYouOwnVsYourSpendableBalance: XRP you own vs. your spendable balance.

onboarding.slideFour_desc: You can send and receive XRP and other trusted tokens as well
onboarding.slideOne_title:
Payments and
payment requests
on the XRP Ledger
onboarding.slideThree_desc: The Xumm application and platform are built with security as a priority. Never enter your secrets again, sign transactions from your own, trusted device.
onboarding.slideTwo_desc: Add multiple accounts, in full access mode, or read only. Send transactions and sign requests with your full access accounts.

payload.UnableVerifyPayload: Unable to verify the payload signature
payload.accountDeleteExchangeSupportWarning: Note: when deleting your XRP ledger account and sending the remaining balance to an exchange, make sure the destination exchange supports deposits using AccountDelete transactions. Not all exchanges do, which results in a support procedure with the exchange to get your funds credited to your account
payload.checkCanOnlyCashByCheckDestination: A Check can only be cashed if the Check destination account is present in XUMM in Read/Write (or regular key) mode.
payload.checkObjectDoesNotExist: Unable to get the Check object. Please make sure the Check exists on the XRP Ledger.
payload.invalidOrMissingSignedTransactionBlob: Invalid or missing signed transaction blob
payload.nonExpiredCheckCanOnlyCancelByCreatedAcc: A (non expired) check can only be cancelled by the account that created it or destination account.
payload.notEnoughLiquidityToSendThisPayment: Not enough liquidity to send this payment.
payload.notVettedTokenTradeWarning:
Trade at your own risk! The token you are about to trade **has not been vetted**.

Anyone can create a token, including creating fake versions of existing tokens that claim to represent projects. If you trade this token, you may not be able to sell it back. You are potentially putting your assets/savings at risk!
payload.payloadAlreadyResolved: This payload has already been signed or rejected. Please repeat the process that generated the request, and scan the new request.
payload.payloadAlreadySigned: The payload has already been signed
payload.payloadExpired: This payload has expired. Please repeat the process that generated the request, and scan the new request.
payload.unableToCheckAssetConversion: Unable to verify the token exchange rate. Please make sure you are properly connected to the internet
payload.unableToGetCheckObject: Unable to get check object. Please make sure you are connected to the XRPL node
payload.unableToGetNetworkFee: Unable to get network fee, please make sure you are connected to the XRPL node
payload.unexpectedPayloadErrorOccurred: The payload is invalid, and will be automatically rejected.
payload.whatDoYouWantToDo: What do you want to do?
payload.willIgnoreTheRequestAndClose: Will ignore the request and close.
payload.tradeEntireTokenWorthWarning: Warning: the amount of %{currency} is equal to or higher than your %{currency} balance of this asset. If this offer is executed, you will fully liquidate your %{currency} position.
payload.paymentToDisallowedXRPWarning: The destination account configured their account to disallow incoming XRP (non-token) payments. If you proceed, you will most likely need support from the destination account owner.
payload.paymentToBlackHoledAccountWarning: The destination account is 'black holed', meaning all funds sent to the destination account will be inaccessible & unrecoverable. Are you sure you want to continue sending your funds to this destination account?
payload.unableToFindTheOfferObject: Unable to find the offer object!
payload.theIssuerCanBurnThisToken: Note: The issuer can burn this token.
payload.payloadForceNetworkError:
This payload is not valid on the network you are connected with.

Please switch to %{network} and try again.
payload.pathDryError:
The transaction didn't work because funds couldn't be moved between the two accounts, or could not be moved at the requested exchange rate.

This might be because the two accounts involved don't have a connection (TrustLine) that allows them to exchange money with each other, or the transaction didn't work because there wasn't enough money available to move between the two accounts.
payload.tecPartialError: The transaction didn't go through because there weren't enough tokens available to send the complete amount at the requested exchange rate between the two accounts.

profile.availableInFuture: This feature will be available in the future.
profile.connectMobile: Be found by phone number or email

scan.invalidClipboardDateTryNewOneOrTryAgain: Invalid clipboard data (for XUMM). Try a new one or try again.
scan.invalidQRTryNewOneOrTryAgain: Invalid QR code (for XUMM), try a new one or try again
scan.scannedQRIsNotXRPAddress: Scanned QR code does not contain a valid XRP address!
scan.scannedQRIsNotXummPayload: Scanned QR code is not a XUMM payload!
scan.theClipboardDataIsNotContainXRPAddress: The clipboard data does not contain a valid XRP address!
scan.theClipboardDataIsNotContainXummPayload: The clipboard data does not contain valid XUMM payload!
scan.theQRIsNotWhatWeExpect: This QR code doesn't contain information we would expect!

send.addressIsUnderInvestigationPleaseCancel: This address is under investigation. Please cancel this transaction.
send.amountIsBiggerThanYourSpend: This amount is bigger than what you can spend (%{spendable})
send.balanceIsNotEnoughForFee: Your balance is not enough to cover the fee (%{fee})
send.destinationCannotActivateWithIOU: The destination account is not activated as it doesn't hold the XRP Ledger enforced minimum balance of %{baseReserve} XRP. To activate an account on the XRP Ledger, an initial deposit of at least %{baseReserve} XRP has to be sent to the account. Non-XRP tokens cannot be used for the initial deposit.
send.destinationIsConfirmedAsScam: The destination account is confirmed as SCAM
send.destinationIsProbableIsScam: The destination account is flagged as high risk
send.destinationNotExistCreationWarning: The destination account hasn't been used before, and doesn't have any balance. If you continue sending to this account, %{baseReserve} XRP of the %{amount} XRP will be used to activate the account on the XRP ledger, meaning %{baseReserve} XRP will not be spendable. Are you sure you want to continue?
send.destinationNotExistTooLittleToCreate: The destination account hasn't been used before, and doesn't have a balance. To activate an account on the XRP ledger, an initial deposit of at least %{baseReserve} XRP is required.
send.destinationTagIsRequired: The destination tag is required for sending this payment.
send.destinationTagWarningConfirm: You are sending to an account with destination tag. Please double check the destination tag: if you send to the wrong tag, you will need support of the Destination to retrieve your funds.
send.enterANameOrAddress: Enter a name or an address
send.invalidDestinationTag: The QR-code doesn't contain a valid Destination Tag. Please check the scanned QR-code and try again
send.memoPublicWarning: Memo info will be public for everyone
send.pleaseEnterYourReasonToContinue: Please enter your reason to continue
send.selectedAccountDoNotSupportAsset: The selected account does not support the selected token.
send.sendToAccountWithDisallowXrpFlagWarning: The destination account indicates that it doesn't want to receive XRP payments. Only non-XRP payments can be sent to this destination.
send.sourceAndDestinationCannotBeSame: Source and Destination address cannot be the same!
send.submittingToLedger: Sending your transaction to the XRP ledger
send.theDestinationAccountIsSetAsBlackHole: The destination account is set as black hole, sending to this account will cause losing sent XRP.
send.theMaxAmountYouCanSendIs: The maximum amount you can send is %{spendable} %{currency}
send.theMaxAmountYouCanSendWithFee: The issuer of %{currency} charges a Transfer Fee. The max. amount you can send (respecting the Transfer Fee) is %{spendable} %{currency}
send.thisAddressRequiredDestinationTag: This address requires a Destination Tag
send.toContinueProvideReasonInYourOwnWords: If you want to continue (not recommended) provide a reason in your own words:
send.transferredSuccessfully: Your transaction has been successfully registered on the XRP Ledger.
send.unableGetRecipientAccountInfoPleaseTryAg: Unable to get recipient account info please try again.
send.unableToSendPaymentNotEnoughLiquidity: Unable to send the payment right now due to lack of liquidity.
send.unableToSendPaymentRecipientDoesNotHaveT:
Unable to send the token to the recipient.
The recipient does not have a TrustLine for this token setup to the issuer of this token.
send.unableToSendPaymentTrustLineLimitIsExcee:
Unable to send the token to the recipient.
The 'Limit' for the amount of tokens the recipient wants to hold is exceeded. The recipient will have to update their TrustLine for the token you're sending with a higher 'Limit' to be able to receive this token.
send.unableToSetFeesPleaseTryAgain: Unable to set transaction fees, please try again.
send.verificationFailedDescription:
Your transaction has been signed and submitted successfully, however, we could not confirm transaction finality.

This can be caused by an internet connection hiccup or increased load on the XRP Ledger node you are connected to.

Please manually verify if this transaction shows in your transaction history (Events).
send.trustLineIsFrozenByIssuer: Your Trust Line for the requested asset (%{currency}) has been frozen by the issuer. Please contact the issuer of the asset.

settings.canNotSendLogsByEmail: An unexpected error occurred. Cannot send logs by email!
settings.changingThemeNeedsRestartToTakeEffect: Changing theme requires the app to restart. Do you want to restart now?
settings.eraseDataDescription: Erase all data after 10 failed passcode attempts
settings.getStartedCreateContact: Get started by adding your first contact.
settings.invalidNodeURL: Entered node url is not a valid url!
settings.newOldPasscodeNotMatch: The new passcode and your confirmation are not the same!
settings.nodeChangeWarning: You are switching from %{from} to %{to}. You may be unable to use your account or view your account history!

settings.unableToLoadListOfCurrencies: Unable to load the list of currencies!
settings.unableToReRegisteredForPushNotifications: An unexpected error occurred! Unable to re-register for push notifications.
settings.showReserveValue: Show reserve value on home screen
settings.biometricUnavailableDescription: Biometric security is unavailable on your device because your device does not offer our requested biometric security level
settings.areYouSureYouWantRevokeAccess: Are you sure you want to revoke access to %{appName}
settings.unableToRevokeAppAccess: An unexpected error occurred! Unable to revoke app access.
settings.onceYouAuthorizedAppYouWillSeeItHere: Once you authorize access to a third party app you'll see them here.
settings.unableToDeleteNodeWhenConnectedToNetwork: Unable to remove the node while connected to this network, please switch network and try again!

setupBiometry.biometryDescription: To make your account safer, you can activate the Biometric Authentication (FaceID /TouchID).

setupPasscode.UnableToStoreThePasscode: Unable to store the passcode. This should not happen. A bug report was sent to the XUMM support team. Please contact us at support@xumm.app for more information.
setupPasscode.passCodeDescription: We use the passcode to lock the app, confirm settings and to keep your account secure.
setupPasscode.warnNeedPasscode: You will need your passcode to unlock the app
setupPasscode.weakPasscodeDescription: The selected passcode is easy to guess. We recommend you to choose a stronger one.

setupPermissions.permissionDescription: We use push notification to send sign requests

setupTermOfService.IOnlyTrustAnswersFromXUMMSupportTeam: I will only trust answers from the XUMM support team at https://support.xumm.app
setupTermOfService.IWillKeepMySecretsSafeAndOffline: I will keep my secret keys safe and offline.
setupTermOfService.IWillKeepMySecretsSafeSoICanReEnterThemI: I will keep my secret account keys safe and offline, so I can re-enter them if I get a new device.
setupTermOfService.IWillNeverGiveMySecretsToAnyone: I will never share my secret keys with anyone nor enter them elsewhere
setupTermOfService.KeepYourSecretsSafeExplain:
Only you, using your account secret(s) can access your funds.

You and you alone are responsible for keeping them safe, offline.

Write down your backups at multiple offline locations.
setupTermOfService.XUMMNotCustodialExplain:
XUMM is a non custodial wallet, meaning your funds aren't in XUMM custody, but 'live' on the XRP Ledger.

Only you can access your funds with your account secrets, as generated by XUMM or imported into XUMM.

This means XUMM and the XUMM team cannot access and cannot recover your funds if you make a mistake or lose your secret keys.
setupTermOfService.iAmResponsibleForKeepingMyKeysAndFundsSa: I'm responsible for keeping my keys and funds safe
setupTermOfService.myFundsAreRegisteredOnTheXRPLedger: All of my funds are stored and registered on the XRP Ledger, not on the XUMM application
setupTermOfService.neverShareYourSecretExplain:
XUMM and the XUMM support department WILL NEVER ask for your secret

If someone does, or asks you to enter your secret somewhere, you are being scammed.

Please do contact us with as much information that you have about the incident.
setupTermOfService.pleaseReadTheTextAboveCarefully: Please read the above text carefully
setupTermOfService.questionsAndSupportExplain:
Please don’t hesitate to contact us if you have any further questions. Our FAQ and support channel can be found here: https://support.xumm.app.

Please note: This is THE ONLY trustworthy channel for XUMM support.
setupTermOfService.transactionsArePermanentExplain:
XUMM cannot revert transactions, or recover funds if you make a mistake.

Transactions are instant and irreversible.
setupTermOfService.whenYouChangeYourPhoneExplain: Using XUMM with a new device will require you to re-enter your secret keys for any accounts you have previously created.
setupTermOfService.yourFundsLiveOnTheXRPLedger: Your funds 'live' on the XRP ledger
setupTermOfService.yourFundsLiveOnTheXRPLedgerExplain:
XUMM is an XRP ledger client application.

This means your XRP does not reside in XUMM but on the XRP Ledger.

Transactions sent and received are sent and received live on/by the XRP ledger.

pro.xummProBetaDescription: Support Xumm & unlock more features like transaction push notifications. More features will be added over time, with early access for Pro Beta subscribers.
